name: sensay-cli
description: CLI tool for Sensay API operations

scripts.generate-sdk: node -e "const axios = require('axios'); const fs = require('fs-extra'); axios.get('https://api.sensay.io/schema').then(res => { fs.ensureDirSync('./src/generated'); fs.writeJsonSync('./src/generated/schema.json', res.data, { spaces: 2 }); console.log('‚úÖ OpenAPI schema downloaded to src/generated/schema.json'); console.log('‚ö†Ô∏è  Please manually update the generated types and API client if the schema has changed.'); console.log('üìù Compare with existing files in src/generated/ and update accordingly.'); }).catch(err => { console.error('‚ùå Failed to download schema:', err.message); process.exit(1); });"

author: Sensay
